summary: To stop an elusive criminal, a maverick detective enlists the aid of a police dog who's an unusually intelligent smart alec.
cast: Jim Belushi|Mel Harris|Kevin Tighe|Ed O'Neill|Rando|James Handy|Daniel Davis|Cotter Smith|John Snyder|Pruitt Taylor Vince|Sherman Howard|Jeff Allin|David Haskell|Alan Blumenfeld|William Sadler|Marjorie Bransfield|Mark Mooring|Jerry Levine|Rick Cicetti|Dan Castellaneta|Wendel Meldrum|John Castellanos|Colleen Morris|McKeiver Jones III|J.W. Smith|Dean Hill|Gary Combs|Steve Artiaga|Lucy Butler|Vic Cuccia|Ralph Elias|Michael John Robert Gill|Michael Joseph Pierce|Kelly C. Ryan
title: Superagente K-9
